citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on April 19,
2023. The phone number was called and contact was made with the registrant who stated that she was unavailable to
facilitate an inspection and there were no other representatives available.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on April 19, 
2023. The phone number was called and contact was made with the registrant who stated that she was unavailable to 
facilitate an inspection and there were no other representatives available. 
 
 
 
End Section
